full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BLA BLU'I CHOG RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(BLA BLU'I CHOG RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD ZHES BYA BA 'DI BLA 'GUGS DGOS PA 'GA' ZHIG GI SKABS, ,LAG TU BZA' BTUNG GI RIGS ZHIG THOGS TE, MING NAS PHYI 'BOD PA BZHIN BYED PA LAS, BYA THABS GZHAN MI SHES PA MANG PO MTHONG PAS RKYEN BYAS TE, MDOS GTO GLUD KYI CHOG 'DI RIGS SDE SNOD LA SPYANGS PA'I DGE BSHES RNAMS 'GAL RKYEN MED CING LTO 'GRANGS NYI MAS DROS PA'I SKABS SPANGS BYA DANG, KYANG SRID SNYAM TE, NAD GDON SOGS KYIS GCES DUS BLANG BYAR MDZAD PAS, ,SPANGS BLANG GANG GI PHYOGS YIN PA MIO SHES KYANG, RMA KHAR PHAN NA KHYI TSIL GYI DOE BZHIN, ,NYE BAR MKHO BA'I SKABS KYANG SRID SNYAM TE, BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA SKYED MOS TSAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
